fields.title: Explanation of Feedback Categories and Sub-categories
fields.content:
Service Providers Issues with finding a service provider, with the execution of the service provider contract, or with other related issues
— Not finding Not able to find appropriate service providers
— Not started Service provider did not start project as agreed
— Delays Service provider was delayed in project execution
— Abandoned Project Service provider abandoned project
— Substandard Service Service provider delivered substandard service
— Other Other issues with service providers
Stakeholders Issues related to the different stakeholders: State PIU officials, FUG and FCA members, Facilitators, or others
— State officials Issue with State PIU officials
— FUG Issue with FUG members
— FCA Issue with FCA members
— Facilitators Issue with Facilitators
— Other Issue with other stakeholders
Land Issues Issues with finding land or finding suitable land, with land ownership, or other related issues
— Not finding Not able to find land for project
— Not suitable Not able to find land that is suitable for project
— Ownership Issue with land ownership
— Other Other issues related to land
Lack of Information Lack of information on markets, agricultural inputs, credit options, or other issues
— Market Lack of information on markets: access, pricing, or other issues
— Input Lack of information on agricultural inputs: what to use or how to use them
— Access to credit Lack of information on obtaining access to credit
— Other Other issues relating to lack of available information
LDP Approval Delays with LDP approval or other LDP-related issues
— Delays Delays with LDP approval
— Other Other issues related to the LDP
Financial Issues Challenges in opening bank account, delays in receiving matching grant, or other financial issues
— Bank Account Opening Issues with opening a bank account
— Delayed Funding Delays in receiving matching grant
— Other Other issues related to finances

fields.title: Explanation of Feedback Categories
fields.content:
Waiting Time Amount of time the reporting patient waited in the facility before receiving care
Staff Friendliness Perceived friendliness of the facility staff from the perspective of the reporting patient
Drug Availability Availability of the drug(s) needed by and/or prescribed to the reporting patient at the facility
Prices Displayed Public display of the prices of drugs and services rendered to the reporting patient at the facility
Cleanliness & Hygiene Perceived cleanliness of the facility and its equipment from the perspective of the reporting patient
